description: A culinary tour of Buford Highway
title: A culinary tour of Buford Highway
title_page: A culinary tour of Buford Highway
text:
1 / 9
Jenni Girtman Havana Sandwich Shop reopened in its original Buford Highway location.
2 / 9
AJC Staff Dishes like Channa Masala are popular at Panahar Restaurant.
3 / 9
Jenni Girtman Vietnamese sandwiches are the main attraction at Lee's Bakery.
4 / 9
Hyosub Shin Owner Carlos Chavez and his employee prepare dishes at Puras Tortas at Plaza Fiesta.
5 / 9
Becky Stein The namesake crustacean is served at Crawfish Shack on Buford Highway.
6 / 9
Becky Stein A server offers tableside dim sum service at Canton House.
7 / 9
Jenni Girtman City Farmers Market is one of the best places to shop for ingredients for Asian or Hispanic fare.
8 / 9
Hyosub Shin Chinatown Mall on Buford Highway has its own food court.
9 / 9
